column1: #Text=Katara says : " Why did they throw you in here ?
#Text=Trying to capture the world 's last hope for peace !
#Text=Spreading war and violence and hatred is in your blood !
#Text=" Zuko says : " You do n't know what you 're talking about !
#Text=You have no idea what this war has put me through !
#Text=The Fire Nation took my mother away from me .
